QuestData.Title: A Sight For Sore Eyes
QuestData.Description: Do you see those ravenous birds flying above my farm? Vicious creatures are spreading their filth an' eatin' my crops.$B$BI'd get rid of them with my trusty gun, but my eyesight's gone downhill.$B$BTake this flare gun and mark them for me.$B$BOnce I get my sights on them, I'll make 'em scatter.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Granny's Flare Gun to mark 6 Black Rook Falcons.
QuestData.RewardText: Well love, we sure did take care of them! Thank you, $c. Glad ta see I 'aven't lost my touch.
